item.description:
Yes, it's that time again. It's Eurovision Song Contest time!!! One of the biggest Euro events of the year...described as being like a Euro Cup football match, but without the fighting. It seems that the contest will be live-streamed over the official Eurovision website. More info? It's all there on the official website;  http://www.eurovision.tv/page/malmo-2013. To check out the stream, click on "webTV" at the top of that homepage.

I will host unless someone closer to Boston is able to host.
item.how_to_find_us: I will host unless someome closer to Boston is able to host.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Eurovision Song Contest
